title: Zenonia Series 1-5 mods
description:
Zenonia 1 v1.2.0

Our protagonist, Regret, was an orphan found amidst the Great War between the gods and demons. Dupre, the commander of the Holy Knights, adopts Regret and raises him. However, Dupre gets killed by a demon king called [Ladon] and Regret finds out the truth behind his existenceâ€¦

â€¢	Enjoy anime style characters and graphics with innovative elements that reflect real life
â€¢	Select between good and evil, and enjoy a different storyline for each
â€¢	Get over 40 hours of gameplay with a single character and epic storyline
â€¢	Accomplish numerous side quests while earning Experience, Reward, Completion, and Apple points
â€¢	Unlock hundreds of unique items and weapons as you play

Mod Info:
- Gained Money Increased Immensely (Sell Something)
Requires Android OS 1.5 and up 



Zenonia 2: The Lost Memories v1.0.5

After [Ladon] has been sealed away, the world is at peace once againâ€¦ until humans are corrupted, again. The gods of Zenonia decide to wipe the memories of all humans using the â€œTree of Life.â€ Humans select 4 heroes to not only restore lost memories, but also keep Ladon imprisoned by searching for the four gems.

â€¢	Enjoy anime-style characters and graphics with innovative elements that reflect real life
â€¢	Play against other registered gamers in the PvP arena
â€¢	Get over 40 hours of gameplay with a single character and epic storyline
â€¢	Accomplish quests to earn points and rewards
â€¢	Unlock hundreds of unique items and weapons as you play

Mod Info:
- Gained Money Increased Immensely (Sell Something)

Requires Android OS 1.5 and up 



Zenonia 3: The Midgard Story v1.0.7

The adopt son of Regret, Chael, gets transported to another world called Midgard. During his time in Midgard, he saves a shaman named Celine. When Celine gets kidnapped by the demons, Chael barges into the demon castle in an attempt to save her. However, he learns his true identity and his true power awakens. Regret travels to Midgard to save Chael, but he ends up sacrificing himself to save Celine and stop the demon king Antioneâ€¦

â€¢	Play a revamped and up-scaled dynamic action RPG
â€¢	Explore 227 unique maps of Migard and complete 136 adventure quests
â€¢	Customize your characters with weapons and armor items
â€¢	Collect achievements, titles and try out the new slot-based inventory management
â€¢	Become immersed in an epic new tale from the world of ZENONIA

Mod Info:
- Gained Money Increased Immensely
Requires Android OS 2.1 and up 



Zenonia 4: Return of the Legend v1.1.8

After sacrificing himself to stop Antione and save Celine, Regret gets trapped inside a world called Land of the Fallen. As a result, Regret loses all his memories. Meanwhile, the world of Zenonia is threatened by another evil figure called Shaturu, or the dark lord. To save the world from imminent destruction brought upon by the dark lord, another Regret from the future visits and restores Regretâ€™s memories. With the help of the fairy Anya, Regret embarks on a journey to stop the rise of the dark lord.

â€¢	Play extreme action RPG in HD
â€¢	Battle 2-on-2 in asynchronous PVE or PVP
â€¢	Customize your characters with weapons and armor items
â€¢	Level up and learn special abilities
â€¢	Explore another epic adventure with the latest ZENONIA

Mod Info:
Infinite Skill Points
- Infinite Stat Points
- Free Shopping (Price Reduced To 0)
- Skill No Cooldown
- Massive Attack
- Can Refine
-Special Always Active
Requires Android OS 2.1 and up 



Zenonia 5: Wheel of Destiny v1.2.1

After the triumphant defeat over Shaturu, Regret is sent off to an unknown time. In the meantime, Lu becomes the king of Andra, and it seemed like peace had returned to the world once again. However, the noble class becomes corrupted by greed and desire for more power. Chaos ensues as Lu, the current king, is murdered by Aster. The hero awakes from his sleep, believing everything was a dreamâ€¦

Mod Info:
- Free Gold Shoping (Price Reduced to 0)
- Skill No Cooldown
- Can Refine
- Free Repair
- High Sales Price

Requires Android OS 4.4 only 

Mods by hokage242
I personally don't support nor I trust his mods. The games are not supposed to ask too many sensitive permissions and the original games never did. Of course he says that he doesn't abuse personal info. It's your choice to accept giving the permissions but noone else modded the games better
